name: nvrel

stmt.origin: mp2(wrel(cnv), wss(cnv, cxp(cvc, universe)), wrel(cxp(cvc, universe)))

body.origin:
|- wrel(cnv)
-| wss(cnv, cxp(cvc, universe))
-| wrel(cxp(cvc, universe))
-| wi(wss(cnv, cxp(cvc, universe)), wi(wrel(cxp(cvc, universe)), wrel(cnv)))
body.pretty:
⊢ Rel(NrmCVec)
⊣ NrmCVec ⊆(CVecOLD × 𝕌)
⊣ Rel((CVecOLD × 𝕌))
⊣ (NrmCVec ⊆(CVecOLD × 𝕌)→(Rel((CVecOLD × 𝕌))→ Rel(NrmCVec)))
